title: Olympic National Park: Education
body: For Teachers Olympic offers a wealth of educational and learning opportunities for teachers, parents, scout and youth leaders, and community organizations. Whether you'd like to use Olympic as your classroom at home or embark on an educational adventure in the park, we can help.  The park's new distance learning program is targeted for classrooms too distant to visit.  Read More                 Freeing the Elwha Explore the important factors involved in removing the Elwha Dams and restoring the Elwha River. Read More        Science Minute Videos See Science in Action! Read More        Science Learning Network Go in-depth and behind the scenes to discover how scientists are protecting our northwest national parks. Read More
